Other components¶

SnapPy incorporates:

Ptolemy module¶

The ptolemy module for studying representations of 3-manifold groups into SL(N, C) and PSL(N, C). By Matthias Goerner.

  • The ptolemy module
    • What is the ptolemy module?
    • Documentation
      • Mathematical preliminaries
      • Step-by-step examples: Part 1
      • Step-by-step examples: Part 2
      • Step-by-step examples: Part 3
      • Step-by-step examples: Part 4
      • Classes

Twister¶

Twister for building surface bundles and Heegaard splittings from mapping class group data. By Marc Bell, Tracy Hall, and Saul Schleimer.
